mapper.insert: insert into t_board_cmt set iboard = #{iboard}, iuser = #{iuser}, ctnt = #{ctnt}
mapper.select: SELECT A.iboard_cmt iboardCmt, A.iboard, A.iuser, A.ctnt, A.created_at createdAt , B.nm, B.main_pic FROM t_board_cmt A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.iboard = #{iboard} ORDER BY iboardCmt DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{row}
